description:
It's nice to be able to use the Web Apps in their own containers. I compulsively close extra browser windows, so having the Office 365 web apps in their own place at work is extremely useful. It keeps me from having to use Windows in a Microsoft-centric workplace.

The one thing I would improve is to make these apps appear in the "Office" menu rather than under "Other".

You only need to authorize once to enjoy the whole service, that's pretty neat.

Only one thing, users can navigate into the other applications by clicking Apps on the top-left of the browser window. It might be closed for good or you can simply close redirection and opening new window.
summary: One time login authorizes all of the clients together

description: Welp, the web app works btw... but aren't able to create a new document nor opening it :'(

Tried opening an excel sheet from the OneDrive app. They woudn't open. Opened the Excel app and tried opening the same document. A NEW window opened up and the sheet still didnt load. Might as well just use the browser.
Word does not work at all. Have to upload from libreoffice to have new documents. Works as expected otherwise.
Really handy to be able to have Outlook, Word, etc. as pinable apps.
Thanks for this simple app. I'm now able to use the Office 365 apps seamlessly on Linux now.

When trying to sign into microsoft the wrapper ends up in just a white screen forever. However, this happens also with electron prospect mail. This one said "excel" as title so I am not sure what I was even signing into? Excel? Anyways.. It seems like someone must take a grip to wrap the microsoft web products.. Any maybe not wrap it all into one huge container..
summary: white screen of death when logging in

description: I really like it, the only thing is, that if I want to open an existing excel sheet (already in drive), it opens it outside the app in a new browser tab. It would be important, that it opens everything inside the application.
summary: Great app and works nearly without problems

description: not working plz do not install this app.

I got Japanese on the menu on OneDrive and OneNote apps. I suspect because my company is a Japanese based company and the domain login is showing I'm from Japan region. However, I do not understand the Japanese language. How to make the menu to display English?
summary: Nice app, but can be improved...

description: Is it possible to add Team?PLz
summary: Is it possible to add Team?PLz

description: Thanks for the awsome application. This is perfect for accessing OneDrive

After finally found this on Discover, I was very excited. But then I found out that Chinese and Japanese input method like ibus-chewing and ibus-anthy couldn't work. And some fonts like PMingLiu doesn't display right.
summary: Chinese and Japanes input method not supported

description: Very handy if you are using microsoft suite, it would be great if the author could include also microsoft to-do. Thanks for this!
summary: very nice wrapper of the web apps, works very well

description: So simple, and such a good (but maybe a bit slow) interface
I really cannot rate it high enough. Having used it regularly I can say that I no longer have to use a windows machine to get the same productivity.
summary: One of the Best Apps in Ubuntu

This app seems to be good but is bad, when i open excel, and click on new blank work book, it says gnome could not load this application, and this is for Excel, PowerPoint and word, do not get this app.

It worked from the word go.
Where compatibility was a problem with limbreoffice I have used this app.
unfurtunately you have to keep signing in i don't like that, but never the less good try.

Is like a mini browser, but when you try open Word, redirecs to your default browser, so this app actually do nothing
Funktioniert sehr gut, danke!

Funktioniert bis jetzt gut. Die Übersicht ist zwar über den Starter 'Excel' zu finden, aber das stört mich persönlich nicht. Sehr brauchbar, wenn man Office unter Ubuntu (oder in meinem Fall Xubuntu) verwenden möchte.
Ich halte von der Anwendung ser fil.
Neue Dokumente ließen sich nicht erstellen; mehrmals installiert und (natürlich bei angemeldetem Konto) ausprobiert. Schade!

Stellt unter Büro einen Eintrag zu den Gratis-Versionen von O365 bereit. Vermutlich nach Upgrade bei MS auf Premium auch die Vollversion.
Daten werden von der persönlichen Microsoft Cloud geladen. Gut für sharing von Dokuimenten und Kollaboration daran.

Application qui remplace dans Linux les fonctionnalités Microsoft Word, Excel, Power Point, OneDrive, OneNote
Fonctionne entièrement avec Ubuntu 19.10 il me reste juste à trouver comment sauvegarder mon pc régulièrement sur OneDrive.
它還是會用我的瀏覽器開啟文件跟編輯文件，但至少可以作用，比較麻煩的是它沒辦法建立新件，會讓我覺得我直接用瀏覽器安裝office套件比較快，不過這個軟體還是比瀏覽器的office還漂亮
summary: 很喜歡，但有些功能還不能用
